test.instr: (:ins (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X book) (color X blue) (sort Y plant))) (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X green) (sort Y table))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X closet))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X red) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (sort Y closet))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X green) (sort Y microwave))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X table))) (:cons_not (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X plant)))) (:cons_notnot (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X remotecontrol) (color X white) (sort Y sofa)))) )
test.nl: There is a book which is blue on the plant. There is a can which is green on the table. The door of the microwave is opened. The door of the closet is closed. Put a cup which is red on the refrigerator. Put a can in the closet. Put a remotecontrol in the microwave. Put the green can in the microwave. Go to the table. Do not go to the plant. The white remotecontrol must be on the sofa.
